relationships.description: Harry is waiting in the shadow of the lilac tree.
The gang is strolling along Magnolia Crescent.
Malcolm's words are causing guffaws from the others.
Piers is complimenting Dudley on his right hook.
Gordon suggests a location for the next meeting, which is at Dudley's place.
Harry waits until the rest of the gang moves on before setting off again.
Dudley invites Gordon to a meeting at his place.
